original_text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation.
korean_text: 남은 유대인들도 그와 같이 외식하므로 바나바도 그들의 외식에 유혹되었느니라

sentences.original_text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 유대인들도 그와 같이 위장했습니다

sentences.original_text: insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away
